text:
Hotelnya masih baru dengan rate yang sangat terjangkau. Lobby nya mewah dan nyaman. Tapi saat sa Check in resepsionis nya hanya 1 org. Jadi rada lumayan ngantri. Design kamarnya minimalist modern. Keren banget.

Staff hotelnya ramah, tapi sayang ga helpful.
Sepertinya harus ditingkatkan lagi excellent servis nya staff hotel. Saya minta karet gelang awalnya ke 1 org staf SERAJOE. Dia blg tggu sebentar. Tapi ga dtg2. Saya nanya ke waiternya, langsung dijawab ga ada bu. Ga puas karena untuk karet gelang di hotel ini masa ga ada sama sekali. Ga masuk akal.
Seharusnya, untuk pelayanan yg excellent, staf hotel ga boleh langsung bilang ga ada, atau ga tau. Setidaknya ada nunjukin usaha untuk bantuin cari dulu. Agak kecewa dengan pelayanan staf2 di SERAJOE.

Terakhir saya minta ke petugas kolam renang, mas IVAN. Mas IVAN ini langsung berusaha untuk nyariin karet gelang nya. Dari 3 staf yg bilang kami ga menyediakan karet gelang, mas IVAN bisa nemu karet gelang, entah dr mana.

Thankyou mas ivan untuk Spirit of excellent nya. Saya sangat apresiasi👍👍

text:
Checking in and out are fast. Lift is also fast. Got a room at 7th floor. Lots of charging outlet in the room. We wanted a king size bed but was full so we got a twin share. Indeed the bed is easily moved so it can be pushed to attach to each other. The bedding is clean and comfortable. The only flaw is the towels smell although it was changed on second day. Shower water is also strong so bathing can be quick.

Breakfast food range is quite varies although day 1 and day 2 menus are quite similar.

Gym room is quite tiny but the equipment are new. Luckily my 2x visit to the gym on odd time had no one so it made my exercise quiet and fun.

Hotel staff is helpful.

The rooftop bar is spacious with indoor and open door, with life band. 

Overall it is a great stay experience.

text:
1. Check-in: I didn’t know nor notified by reception that THEY HAVE A SMOKING-ROOM. I was put into a smoking-room despite I put the preference of non-smoking room in my booking. I found it out the hard way when I was welcome by odd smell in the room and I saw an ashtray. Any hotel that provides a smoking-room should have made this clear to the guest during check-in, otherwise it might ruin the guest’s experience.

2. Bedroom: spacious and clean. Turns out the hotel is pretty much a brand new in the area and they were still at the state of soft opening. Nice wooden floor. You can catch a strong hint of smoky smell because it’s a smoking room.

3. Bathroom: Looks pristine and modern. It’s clean and spacious. Nice amenities.

4. Breakfast: Large buffet spread. Mainly Indonesian local delicacies and some Western foods. Loves the local “jajanan nasi” served in “gerobag” wooden food stall. The hotel also serves the local herbal drink such as kunyit asam or temulawak.  A nice kick to start the day.

5. Parking: They provide a secure, indoor parking

6. Location: Closed to the toll-gate to either Solo or Jakarta’s direction. It’s pretty strategic place and despite being not  too central location-wise, there are lots of cafe and exciting foodie places for a nice culinary experience.

6. Overall: spent Rp 670,000 per night. The hotel itself has some good elements but staying at smoking room literally ruin the whole experience. Most modern hotels prohibit smoking and may even fine their guest if caught smoking.
title: Should be mandatory to notify hotel guests about THE SMOKING ROOM during check-in.

text: Our second stop of our Central Java Trip , we dare ourselves to try this new hotel, but it turned out of our expectations. The building and interior is very nice and aesthetic. Very friendly and helpfull staff and shoutout to staff named Kevin because he's super friendly and informative, we need to thank to him because now we got a lot of delicious Semarang food destinations and I was touched when I saw him really helping my mother who’s 86yo walking up the stairs even other hotel which we stayed in before didn't do that. Aruss hotel lobby needs people like him! Sadly we need to wait some time for the check in process. The rooms are quite spacious and have a beautiful interior. The air cond is very cold. Unfortunately the gym is still on process to be operated and we are not allowed to swim because we’re not our wearing our swim suit but on the positive side it means this hotel really maintains its water quality. Overall staying here is really worth the price and going to be our place to stay when we're going back to semarang , Definitely recommend and please keep the great quality!
